document_data.name: Garias
document_data.mainbody:
'''Garias''' was a member of the [[Zhentarim]] that operated within the organization's [[Zhentarim hideout (Risen Road)|hideout]] hidden beneath [[Waukeen's Rest]] inn during the late 15{{th}} century [[DR]].

{{Quote|Don't touch anything you ain't paid for.|Garias, to potential trading partners.}}
document_data.Personality: He liked colorful, pretty [[birds]] and kind of wanted a picture of one.
document_data.Activities: Garias served as a greeter of sorts for his fellow Zhentarim agents, granting access to those given permission by their leader [[Zarys]].
document_data.History: He was among those present in the hidden Zhentarim outpost when it was set to be destroyed in the {{YearlinkName|1492}}. The group was going to cave-in the caverns in which they operated, following the abduction of Grand Duke [[Ulder Ravengard]] from Waukeen's Rest right above them.
